title: Horse flickers
creator_credit: Bill Stitt, Rhonda Raulston, Jim Gruebel and Bill Stitt Productions
brief_description: Non-narrated children’s film in which a series of images of horses comes to life on a barn floor. They are composed of feathers and spangles, newspapers and sleeping bags, human beings and broomsticks and combine imagination, humour, whimsy and art. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Bill Stitt, Rhonda Raulston, Jim Gruebel and Bill Stitt Productions
